Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25567 affecting package gssntlmssp for versions less than 1.3.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-25567 affecting package gssntlmssp for versions less than 1.3.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package gssntlmssp is earlier than 1.3.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-25567
